column4: any advice on how to fix this error => /var/log/btmp The file is not a regular file or is not a text file.
any advice on how to fix this error => /var/log/btmp The file is not a regular file or is not a text file.
what is the output of: file /var/log/btmp
it says Impossible to open the file /var/log/btmp
sudo touch /var/log/btmp
mine is: /var/log/btmp: empty
the touch file will create it for you
nothing happen
it wont, in linux no news is good news, you dont get an 'ok" after every command, its redundant
if you run the file command from earlier you will now see it exists
I noticed that when i try to login and if the login fail this is what shows up in the log viewer
is the file there?
nope
it looks like its needed for some reason
try: sudo nano /var/log/btmp       then in nano press ctrl+x, press y then press enter
that should make an empty file for you
when i press ctlr+x it exit nano
hmm strange
i am going to take a screenshot of the log viewer
ok lets be sneaky
cd /var/log
file * | grep empty
you can then run: sudo cp ./<one of the files it finds> ./btmp
